cat << 'ENDOFFILE' > train_and_predict.py
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.preprocessing import OneHotEncoder, StandardScaler
from sklearn.compose import ColumnTransformer
from sklearn.pipeline import Pipeline
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestRegressor, GradientBoostingRegressor
from xgboost import XGBRegressor
from lightgbm import LGBMRegressor
from catboost import CatBoostRegressor
from sklearn.metrics import mean_squared_error, r2_score
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings('ignore')

# Load data
train = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')
validation = pd.read_csv('data/validation.csv')

# Define target and features
target = 'SalePrice'
features = [col for col in train.columns if col != target]

# Handle missing values: fill with median for numerical, mode for categorical
numerical_cols = train.select_dtypes(include=[np.number]).columns.tolist()
categorical_cols = train.select_dtypes(include=['object']).columns.tolist()

# Fill missing values
for col in numerical_cols:
    if col != target:
        train[col] = train[col].fillna(train[col].median())
        test[col] = test[col].fillna(test[col].median())

for col in categorical_cols:
    train[col] = train[col].fillna(train[col].mode()[0])
    test[col] = test[col].fillna(test[col].mode()[0])

# Feature engineering
# Create year-related features
train['Age'] = train['YrSold'] - train['YearBuilt']
train['RemodAge'] = train['YrSold'] - train['YearRemodAdd']
test['Age'] = test['YrSold'] - test['YearBuilt']
test['RemodAge'] = test['YrSold'] - test['YearRemodAdd']

# Create floor area ratios
train['TotalFlrSF'] = train['1stFlrSF'] + train['2ndFlrSF']
test['TotalFlrSF'] = test['1stFlrSF'] + test['2ndFlrSF']

# Create basement-related ratios
train['BsmtRatio'] = train['TotalBsmtSF'] / (train['1stFlrSF'] + train['2ndFlrSF'] + 1)
test['BsmtRatio'] = test['TotalBsmtSF'] / (test['1stFlrSF'] + test['2ndFlrSF'] + 1

cat << 'ENDOFFILE' > train_and_predict.py
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.preprocessing import OneHotEncoder, StandardScaler
from sklearn.compose import ColumnTransformer
from sklearn.pipeline import Pipeline
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestRegressor
from xgboost import XGBRegressor
from sklearn.metrics import r2_score
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings('ignore')

# Load data
train = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Define target and features
target = 'SalePrice'
features = [col for col in train.columns if col != target]

# Handle missing values
numerical_cols = train.select_dtypes(include=[np.number]).columns.tolist()
categorical_cols = train.select_dtypes(include=['object']).columns.tolist()

# Fill missing values
for col in numerical_cols:
    if col != target:
        train[col] = train[col].fillna(train[col].median())
        test[col] = test[col].fillna(test[col].median())

for col in categorical_cols:
    train[col] = train[col].fillna(train[col].mode()[0])
    test[col] = test[col].fillna(test[col].mode()[0])

# Feature engineering
# Age and remod age
train['Age'] = train['YrSold'] - train['YearBuilt']
train['RemodAge'] = train['YrSold'] - train['YearRemodAdd']
test['Age'] = test['YrSold'] - test['YearBuilt']
test['RemodAge'] = test['YrSold'] - test['YearRemodAdd']

# Floor area
train['TotalFlrSF'] = train['1stFlrSF'] + train['2ndFlrSF']
test['TotalFlrSF'] = test['1stFlrSF'] + test['2ndFlrSF']

# Basement ratio
train['BsmtRatio'] = train['TotalBsmtSF'] / (train['1stFlrSF'] + train['2ndFlrSF'] + 1)
test['BsmtRatio'] = test['TotalBsmtSF'] / (test['1stFlrSF'] + test['2ndFlrSF'] + 1)

# Garage ratio
train['GarageRatio'] = train['GarageArea'] / (train['GarageCars'] + 1)
test['GarageRatio'] = test['GarageArea'] / (test['GarageCars'] + 1)

# Porch area
train['PorchArea'] = train['WoodDeckSF'] + train['OpenPorchSF'] + train['EnclosedPorch'] + tr
